page.title: 11Weston Park Boy's School
page.content:
Weston Park Boy's School is a {comprehensive school}situated in Sholing, Southampton it has a good reputation with it's neighbours.The school takes boys from the age of twelve to sixteen in four year groups. A typical day is divided into 8 lessons,some of which are{academic}and some are not.The latter includes Games,Art and Music. In all,about 25 subjects are offered,including courses linked with local F.E.Colleges.The approximate pupil/teacher ratio is 18:1.We concentrate on a great number of sports for all boys and anyone who is good enough can represent the school and sometimes the county. The school encourages{outdoor} {pursuits}such as trips to the New Forest,Wales,Scotland and Europe.
{
